tags: their friendship keeps me alive it's so great
gimme that slowburn friends to lovers
or not tbh i would be fine if they kept being best friends
summary: I love that, even months after first getting to know her, Jester still thinks Beau is THE COOLEST and nothing can change how...
question: I love that, even months after first getting to know her, Jester still thinks Beau is THE COOLEST and nothing can change how awed she is whenever Beau does anything
answer:
things Jester can do:

  • Summon spiritual guardians that look like pocket unicorns
  • Summon a giant lollipop to bash her enemies with
  • Heal and bring people back from the dead
  • Talk to her god and call upon that god’s help
  • A lot more stuff but I’m forgetful

people Jester is surrounded by:

  • Wizard hobo who has spells that allow him to do nearly anything
  • Goblin rogue who can also do magic while being amazing at stealth
  • Half-orc warlock that swallows orbs and gets stronger and is powered by a sea god
  • Firbolg cleric with the uncanny ability to read people and also prevents people from dying just by being there
  • A literal fallen angel that wreaks havoc on the battlefield and follows storms and has these cool wings and a mysterious god
  • Tiefling blood hunter that uses their own blood to hurt others and make them go blind amongst other things

and out of all the other shit she’s seen, she thinks the human monk who’s the most normal out of all of them- aside from having punches strong enough to make people tell the truth and harm ghosts- is the coolest?? and how she always believed in beau’s abilities, enough that she had full faith she would be able to convince the plank king??

that’s my type of relationship right there
